  • public interface DewLanguageBindingInterface
    Author:
    Will Stuckey

        void setInterpreterAssertions(java.lang.Object[] assertions)
        Passes the interpreter assertions for setting and evaluating properties.

      • getBoundEntity

        java.lang.Object getBoundEntity(java.lang.String entityTreePath)
        Searches the Object-Property tree for an entity in the given path.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the entity, null if reference not found

        Searches the Object-Property tree for a property belonging to an entity in the given path.

        Returns:
        the property, null if reference not found

        value -
        Returns:
        if the value was successfully set

      • execInternalCommand

        void execInternalCommand(java.lang.String commandLine)
        Has the command processor to execute a command via implicit console
        Parameters:
        commandLine - the entire command line
        See Also:
        Console

      • sync

        void sync()
        Tells the system to sync before an interpreter call. This function is only called when the interpreter determines the next operation might require a sync to be thread safe.

      • sync

        void sync(java.lang.Object syncObject)
        Tells the system to sync around a sync object before an interpreter call. This function is only called when the interpreter determines the next operation might require a sync to be thread safe.
        Parameters:
        syncObject -

      • halt

        void halt()
        Instructs the system to halt interpreter operations and sync.

      • exit

        void exit(int exitCode)
        Instructs the system to stop
        Parameters:
        exitCode - an exit code for debugging

      • forceExit

        void forceExit(int exitCode)
        Instructs the system to force quit
        Parameters:
        exitCode - an exit code for debugging
